buttons.title: Button
buttons.subtitle: Buttons allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap.

textField.title: Text Field
textField.description: Text Fields let users enter and edit text. Allow to specify a property dark to chance the style in dark or light theme. This component derive from MUI TextField. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Text Field

searchField.title: Search Field
searchField.description: A Text Field decorated with an icon to specify that the input data is a search term. This component derive from MUI TextField. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Text Field

passwordField.title: Password Field
passwordField.description: A Text Field to input a password. This component derive from MUI TextField. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Text Field

select.title: Select
select.description: Menus are positioned under their emitting elements, unless they are close to the bottom of the viewport. Allow to specify a property dark to chance the style in dark or light theme. This component derive from MUI TextField. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Select

switch.title: Switch
switch.description: Switches toggle the state of a single setting on or off. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Switch

datetimePicker.title: DatetimePicker
datetimePicker.description: Component to select date and time. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Date and Time Pickers

datePicker.title: DatePicker
datePicker.description: Component to select date. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Date and Time Pickers

timePicker.title: TimePicker
timePicker.description: Component to select time. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Date and Time Pickers

autocomplete.title: Autocomplete
autocomplete.description: This component derive from MUI Autocomplete. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Autocomplete

statusPicker.title: StatusPicker
statusPicker.description: Allows you to specify an element that represents a status from a list of status.

flexBox.title: FlexBox
flexBox.description: This component is derived from the Box component of MUI with display: flex by default. For more information about the props supported by the component visit  Flex Box

directionDemo.title: flex-direction
directionDemo.description: For more information please see flex-direction on MDN.

sideBar.title: Sidebar
sideBar.description: Define a Sidebar component to show the main menu and the user options

pageLayout.title: Page Layout
pageLayout.description: Define a layout to specified the content of a page

centerPageLayout.title: Center Page Layout
centerPageLayout.description: Define a layout to specified the content of a page with a default predefined small or big top margin

scrollPageLayout.title: Scroll Page Layout
scrollPageLayout.description: Define a scrollable layout to specified the content of a page

pagePaperLayout.title: Page Paper Layout
pagePaperLayout.description: Define a layout with a shadow border to specified the content of a page with a title a padding and an actions sections

tabsPaperLayout.title: Tab Paper Layout
tabsPaperLayout.description: Define a layout with a shadow border to specified the content of a page with tabs. Allow specify a number in pixels to limit the max height of the scrollable area. The final size will be (100vh - number).

forms.title: Form
forms.subtitle: High performance Form component with data scope management. Including data collection, verification, and styles.

loginSample.title: Simple Validation.
loginSample.description: Sample of a form that send username and password.

validationSample.title: Validations.
validationSample.description: Sample of a form with validation of different fields like names, url, email, dates, account numbers, passwords, etc.

asyncValidationSample.title: Async Validation.
asyncValidationSample.description: Sample of a form with async validation.

conditionalValidationSample.title: Conditional Validation.
conditionalValidationSample.description: Sample of a form with conditional validation.

nestedFieldsSample.title: Nested Fields.
nestedFieldsSample.description: Sample of a form with nested fields.

listFieldsSample.title: Array Fields.
listFieldsSample.description: Sample of a form with a field that is a list of elements.
